# The `PPCBranchCoalescing.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Coalesce basic blocks guarded by the same branch condition into a single basic block. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Coalesce basic blocks guarded by the same branch condition into a single basic block.

<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                               PPCBranchCoalescing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Improve scheduling by coalescing branches that depend on the same condition.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This pass looks for blocks that are guarded by the same branch condition</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and attempts to merge the blocks together. Such opportunities arise from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the expansion of select statements in the IR.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This pass does not handle implicit operands on branch statements. In order</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to run on targets that use implicit operands, changes need to be made in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">/// canCoalesceBranch and canMerge methods.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Example: the following LLVM IR</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %test = icmp eq i32 %x 0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %tmp1 = select i1 %test, double %a, double 0.002</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %tmp2 = select i1 %test, double %b, double 0.005</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">/// expands to the following machine code:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// %bb.0: derived from LLVM BB %entry</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">///    liveins: %f1 %f3 %x6</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">///        &lt;SNIP1&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">///        %0 = COPY %f1; F8RC:%0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">///        %5 = CMPLWI killed %4, 0; CRRC:%5 GPRC:%4</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">///        %8 = LXSDX %zero8, killed %7, implicit %rm;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">///                    mem:LD8&#91;ConstantPool&#93; F8RC:%8 G8RC:%7</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">///        BCC 76, %5, &lt;%bb.2&gt;; CRRC:%5</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">///    Successors according to CFG: %bb.1(?%) %bb.2(?%)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// %bb.1: derived from LLVM BB %entry</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">///    Predecessors according to CFG: %bb.0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">///    Successors according to CFG: %bb.2(?%)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">/// %bb.2: derived from LLVM BB %entry</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">///    Predecessors according to CFG: %bb.0 %bb.1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">///        %9 = PHI %8, &lt;%bb.1&gt;, %0, &lt;%bb.0&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">///                    F8RC:%9,%8,%0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">///        &lt;SNIP2&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">///        BCC 76, %5, &lt;%bb.4&gt;; CRRC:%5</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">///    Successors according to CFG: %bb.3(?%) %bb.4(?%)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">/// %bb.3: derived from LLVM BB %entry</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">///    Predecessors according to CFG: %bb.2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">///    Successors according to CFG: %bb.4(?%)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">/// %bb.4: derived from LLVM BB %entry</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">///    Predecessors according to CFG: %bb.2 %bb.3</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">///        %13 = PHI %12, &lt;%bb.3&gt;, %2, &lt;%bb.2&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">///                     F8RC:%13,%12,%2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">///        &lt;SNIP3&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">///        BLR8 implicit %lr8, implicit %rm, implicit %f1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">/// When this pattern is detected, branch coalescing will try to collapse</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">/// it by moving code in %bb.2 to %bb.0 and/or %bb.4 and removing %bb.3.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If all conditions are meet, IR should collapse to:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">/// %bb.0: derived from LLVM BB %entry</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">///    liveins: %f1 %f3 %x6</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">///        &lt;SNIP1&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">///        %0 = COPY %f1; F8RC:%0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">///        %5 = CMPLWI killed %4, 0; CRRC:%5 GPRC:%4</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">///        %8 = LXSDX %zero8, killed %7, implicit %rm;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">///                     mem:LD8&#91;ConstantPool&#93; F8RC:%8 G8RC:%7</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">///        &lt;SNIP2&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">///        BCC 76, %5, &lt;%bb.4&gt;; CRRC:%5</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">///    Successors according to CFG: %bb.1(0x2aaaaaaa / 2147483648 = 33.33%)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">///      %bb.4(0x55555554 / 2147483648 = 66.67%)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">/// %bb.1: derived from LLVM BB %entry</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">///    Predecessors according to CFG: %bb.0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">///    Successors according to CFG: %bb.4(0x40000000 / 2147483648 = 50.00%)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">/// %bb.4: derived from LLVM BB %entry</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">///    Predecessors according to CFG: %bb.0 %bb.1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">///        %9 = PHI %8, &lt;%bb.1&gt;, %0, &lt;%bb.0&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">///                    F8RC:%9,%8,%0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">///        %13 = PHI %12, &lt;%bb.1&gt;, %2, &lt;%bb.0&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">///                     F8RC:%13,%12,%2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">///        &lt;SNIP3&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">///        BLR8 implicit %lr8, implicit %rm, implicit %f1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Branch Coalescing does not split blocks, it moves everything in the same</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">/// direction ensuring it does not break use/definition semantics.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">/// PHI nodes and its corresponding use instructions are moved to its successor</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">/// block if there are no uses within the successor block PHI nodes.  PHI</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">/// node ordering cannot be assumed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Non-PHI can be moved up to the predecessor basic block or down to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">/// successor basic block following any PHI instructions. Whether it moves</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">/// up or down depends on whether the register(s) defined in the instructions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">/// are used in current block or in any PHI instructions at the beginning of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the successor block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-ppcbranchcoalescing-cpp-"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Analyze the branch statement to determine if it can be coalesced. This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="comment">/// method analyses the branch statement for the given candidate to determine</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if it can be coalesced. If the branch can be coalesced, then the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BranchTargetBlock and the FallThroughBlock are recorded in the specified</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Candidate.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="comment">///\\return true if and only if the branch can be coalesced, false otherwise</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PPCBranchCoalescing::canCoalesceBranch(CoalescingCandidateInfo &amp;Cand) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The analyzeBranch method does not include any implicit operands.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is not an issue on PPC but must be handled on other targets.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For this pass to be made target-independent, the analyzeBranch API</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// need to be updated to support implicit operands and there would</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// need to be a way to verify that any implicit operands would not be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// clobbered by merging blocks.  This would include identifying the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// implicit operands as well as the basic block they are defined in.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This could be done by changing the analyzeBranch API to have it also</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// record and return the implicit operands and the blocks where they are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// defined. Alternatively, the BranchCoalescing code would need to be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// extended to identify the implicit operands.  The analysis in canMerge</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// must then be extended to prove that none of the implicit operands are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// changed in the blocks that are combined during coalescing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Determine if the two operand lists are identical</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This function checks if MI can be moved to the beginning of the TargetMBB</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="comment">/// following PHI instructions. A MI instruction can be moved to beginning of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the TargetMBB if there are no uses of it within the TargetMBB PHI nodes.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; MI the machine instruction to move.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; TargetMBB the machine basic block to move to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\return true if it is safe to move MI to beginning of TargetMBB,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="comment">///         false otherwise.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcbranchcoalescing-cpp-/ppcbranchcoalescing/#aa8661c8ac8b1cb3810a45d201972e5d5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcbranchcoalescing-cpp-/ppcbranchcoalescing/#aa8661c8ac8b1cb3810a45d201972e5d5">PPCBranchCoalescing::canMoveToBeginning</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal">                                          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;TargetMBB</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This function checks if MI can be moved to the end of the TargetMBB,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="comment">/// immediately before the first terminator.  A MI instruction can be moved</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to then end of the TargetMBB if no PHI node defines what MI uses within</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="comment">/// it&#39;s own MBB.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; MI the machine instruction to move.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; TargetMBB the machine basic block to move to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\return true if it is safe to move MI to end of TargetMBB,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This method checks to ensure the two coalescing candidates follows the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="comment">/// expected pattern required for coalescing.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; SourceRegion The candidate to move statements from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; TargetRegion The candidate to move statements to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\return true if all instructions in SourceRegion.BranchBlock can be merged</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="comment">/// into a block in TargetRegion; false otherwise.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PPCBranchCoalescing::validateCandidates(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">    CoalescingCandidateInfo &amp;SourceRegion,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">    CoalescingCandidateInfo &amp;TargetRegion)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TargetRegion.BranchTargetBlock != SourceRegion.BranchBlock)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expecting SourceRegion to immediately follow TargetRegion&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!MDT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinedominatortree/#a0dbb37174d54679518ca9ed1a0e7016e">dominates</a>(TargetRegion.BranchBlock, SourceRegion.BranchBlock))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expecting TargetRegion to dominate SourceRegion&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!MPDT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#a5d344fb542e2d57c633f0161e3a6b231">dominates</a>(SourceRegion.BranchBlock, TargetRegion.BranchBlock))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expecting SourceRegion to post-dominate TargetRegion&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!TargetRegion.FallThroughBlock-&gt;empty() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">           !SourceRegion.FallThroughBlock-&gt;empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expecting fall-through blocks to be empty&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This method determines whether the two coalescing candidates can be merged.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In order to be merged, all instructions must be able to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="comment">///   1 Move to the beginning of the SourceRegion.BranchTargetBlock;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="comment">///   2 Move to the end of the TargetRegion.BranchBlock.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Merging involves moving the instructions in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="comment">/// TargetRegion.BranchTargetBlock (also SourceRegion.BranchBlock).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This function first try to move instructions from the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="comment">/// TargetRegion.BranchTargetBlock down, to the beginning of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="comment">/// SourceRegion.BranchTargetBlock. This is not possible if any register defined</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="comment">/// in TargetRegion.BranchTargetBlock is used in a PHI node in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="comment">/// SourceRegion.BranchTargetBlock. In this case, check whether the statement</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="comment">/// can be moved up, to the end of the TargetRegion.BranchBlock (immediately</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="comment">/// before the branch statement). If it cannot move, then these blocks cannot</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="comment">/// be merged.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that there is no analysis for moving instructions past the fall-through</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="comment">/// blocks because they are confirmed to be empty. An assert is thrown if they</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="comment">/// are not.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; SourceRegion The candidate to move statements from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; TargetRegion The candidate to move statements to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\return true if all instructions in SourceRegion.BranchBlock can be merged</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="comment">///         into a block in TargetRegion, false otherwise.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcbranchcoalescing-cpp-/ppcbranchcoalescing/#a481db3ca9a03829503a402a2318a27b1"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcbranchcoalescing-cpp-/ppcbranchcoalescing/#a481db3ca9a03829503a402a2318a27b1">PPCBranchCoalescing::canMerge</a>(CoalescingCandidateInfo &amp;SourceRegion,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal">                                CoalescingCandidateInfo &amp;TargetRegion)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!validateCandidates(SourceRegion, TargetRegion))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Walk through PHI nodes first and see if they force the merge into the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SourceRegion.BranchTargetBlock.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal">           <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = SourceRegion.BranchBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a172e7bd9150eb0519ef04c796086f93d">instr&#95;begin</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="normal">           E = SourceRegion.BranchBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#aa7dc7faaab4856b8f0014b8283e26c7b">getFirstNonPHI</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="normal">       <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Def : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;defs())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> : MRI-&gt;use&#95;instructions(Def.getReg())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a>.isPHI() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a>.getParent() == SourceRegion.BranchTargetBlock) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><Highlight kind="normal">                     &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;PHI &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="normal">                     &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; defines register used in another &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="normal">                        </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;PHI within branch target block -- can&#39;t merge\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="normal">          NumPHINotMoved++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Merge the instructions from SourceRegion.BranchBlock,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="comment">/// SourceRegion.BranchTargetBlock, and SourceRegion.FallThroughBlock into</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="comment">/// TargetRegion.BranchBlock, TargetRegion.BranchTargetBlock and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="comment">/// TargetRegion.FallThroughBlock respectively.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The successors for blocks in TargetRegion will be updated to use the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="comment">/// successors from blocks in SourceRegion. Finally, the blocks in SourceRegion</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="comment">/// will be removed from the function.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A region consists of a BranchBlock, a FallThroughBlock, and a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BranchTargetBlock. Branch coalesce works on patterns where the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="comment">/// TargetRegion&#39;s BranchTargetBlock must also be the SourceRegions&#39;s</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BranchBlock.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="comment">///  Before mergeCandidates:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="comment">///  +---------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="comment">///  |  TargetRegion.BranchBlock |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="comment">///  +---------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="comment">///     /        |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="comment">///    /   +--------------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="comment">///   |    |  TargetRegion.FallThroughBlock |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="comment">///    \\   +--------------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="comment">///     \\        |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="comment">///  +----------------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="comment">///  |  TargetRegion.BranchTargetBlock  |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="comment">///  |  SourceRegion.BranchBlock        |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="comment">///  +----------------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="comment">///     /        |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="comment">///    /   +--------------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="comment">///   |    |  SourceRegion.FallThroughBlock |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="comment">///    \\   +--------------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="comment">///     \\        |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="comment">///  +----------------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="comment">///  |  SourceRegion.BranchTargetBlock  |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="comment">///  +----------------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><Highlight kind="comment">///  After mergeCandidates:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><Highlight kind="comment">///  +-----------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><Highlight kind="comment">///  |  TargetRegion.BranchBlock   |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><Highlight kind="comment">///  |  SourceRegion.BranchBlock   |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><Highlight kind="comment">///  +-----------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><Highlight kind="comment">///     /        |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><Highlight kind="comment">///    /   +---------------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><Highlight kind="comment">///   |    |  TargetRegion.FallThroughBlock  |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><Highlight kind="comment">///   |    |  SourceRegion.FallThroughBlock  |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><Highlight kind="comment">///    \\   +---------------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><Highlight kind="comment">///     \\        |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><Highlight kind="comment">///  +----------------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><Highlight kind="comment">///  |  SourceRegion.BranchTargetBlock  |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><Highlight kind="comment">///  +----------------------------------+</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; SourceRegion The candidate to move blocks from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; TargetRegion The candidate to move blocks to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcbranchcoalescing-cpp-/ppcbranchcoalescing/#a072a336f973a3de4daa8fe16e5b4570f"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcbranchcoalescing-cpp-/ppcbranchcoalescing/#a072a336f973a3de4daa8fe16e5b4570f">PPCBranchCoalescing::mergeCandidates</a>(CoalescingCandidateInfo &amp;SourceRegion,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><Highlight kind="normal">                                       CoalescingCandidateInfo &amp;TargetRegion) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SourceRegion.MustMoveUp &amp;&amp; SourceRegion.MustMoveDown) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
